## R Markdown

```{r}
hw1 <- read_csv("hw1_data.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(hw1)
```

```{r}
head(hw1, 2)
```

```{r}
tail(hw1, 2)
```

```{r}
hw1$Ozone[47]
```

```{r}
hw1 %>% 
count(Ozone)
```

```{r}
hw1 %>% 
summarise(mean = mean(Ozone, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
hw1 %>% 
  filter(Ozone > 31 | Temp > 90) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(Solar.R, na.rm = TRUE))
```
